Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerAndComponents

Class RealPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerAndComponents.Player
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerAndComponents.RealPlayer
public class RealPlayer
extends Player
this class extends player and represent a real player with all the functionalities

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    RealPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname, java.util.List<LeaderCard> personalLeaderCards)
    this constructor create a player giving him his nickname and a deck of 4 leader cards, of which 2 of them will be discarded before the game start

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean activateLeaderCard​(int toActivate)
    this method activate the leader card specified by the parameter (it can be the first one or the second one) the method verify if the player have all the requirements to activate the card, and in case activating it, if the card selected is already active does not activate it and return false
    boolean activateProduction​(CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse, CollectionResources toPayFromStrongbox, CollectionResources toPlaceInBuffer)
    this method activate the production, in particular it removes from warehouse and from strongbox the resources given in input and add to the buffer toPlaceInBuffer
    void addDiscount​(Resource toAdd)
    this method is called when the player activate a new discount leader card, if it is the first time, it create a new dashboard adding the resource toAdd if it is the second time, it just add the resource to the discounted ones
    void addFaithPoints​(int toAdd)
    this method adds faith points to the player increasing his position on the track
    void addLeaderProduction​(Resource toAdd)
    this method is used to create/activate a leader production.
    void addLeaderShelf​(Resource toAdd)
    this method is called when the player activate a shelf leader card, and it create a new leader shelf
    void addLeaderWhiteMarble​(Resource toAdd)
    this method is called when the player activate a new white marble leader card and add a new marble that can be used to substitute a white marble when buying resources from market
    int addResourcesToWarehouse​(CollectionResources toAdd, int numShelf)
    this method insert a resource in warehouse
    void buyDevelopmentCard​(CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse, CollectionResources toPayFromStrongbox)
    this method buy the a development card removing resources from the dashboard in particular, it removes the resources in the input from the strongbox and from warehouse if the player has a discount of resources, the resources are already discounted by the game
    boolean checkVaticanReport​(int index)
    this method verify if a player is in condition to handle a vatican report relative to the index-th pope favour tile in particular, if the position of the player is higher or equals than the end position of the tile
    boolean discardLeaderCard​(int toDiscard)
    this method discard the leader card specified by the parameter (it can be the first one or the second one) if the card has already been activated, it does not discard it if not, the method return true
    void fillStrongboxWithBuffer()
    this method insert in strongbox all resources contained in buffer
    Marble getLeaderWhiteMarble​(int index)
    this method get the marble at position index
    java.util.List<Marble> getLeaderWhiteMarbles()
    this method get the leader white marbles
    java.lang.String getNickname()
    this method get the nickname
    Dashboard getPersonalDashboard()
    this method get the personal dashboard
    java.util.List<LeaderCard> getPersonalLeaderCards()
    this method get the personal leader cards
    TrackManager getPersonalTrack()
    this method get the personal track
    CollectionResources getTotalDiscountedResources()
    this method get the total discounted resources of the player
    CollectionResources getTotalResources()
    this method get the total resources of the player
    int getVictoryPoints()
    this method get all the victory points of the player in particular, it get the victory points from the dashboard, from the personal track and from the leader cards owned
    void locateDevelopmentCard​(DevelopmentCard toPlace, int position)
    this method is used to locate a card in one of the three position in dashboard.
    int shiftResources​(int source, int destination)
    this method is used to shift resources between two shelves,
    void vaticanReport​(int index)
    this method set the pope favor tile index-th if the player position is higher or equals than the end position of the tile

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public RealPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname, java.util.List<LeaderCard> personalLeaderCards)

      Parameters:
      nickname - this is the nickname to set
      personalLeaderCards - these are the initial leader cards owned

      public boolean checkVaticanReport​(int index)
      this method verify if a player is in condition to handle a vatican report relative to the index-th pope favour tile in particular, if the position of the player is higher or equals than the end position of the tile
      Overrides:
      checkVaticanReport in class Player
      Parameters:
      index - this is index relative to the pope favour tile to check
      Returns:
      true if the player is in condition to handle a vatican report, false otherwise

    • shiftResources

      public int shiftResources​(int source, int destination)
      this method is used to shift resources between two shelves,
      Parameters:
      source - contains the number associate to a shelf. this is the shelf where i take the resource
      destination - contains the number associate to a shelf. this is the shelf where i put the resource contained in source shelf
      Returns:
      the number of discarded resources

    • addResourcesToWarehouse

      public int addResourcesToWarehouse​(CollectionResources toAdd, int numShelf)
      this method insert a resource in warehouse
      Parameters:
      toAdd - this is the resource that a player want to insert in warehouse
      numShelf - this is the number of warehouse shelf
      Returns:
      the number of rejected resources

    • locateDevelopmentCard

      public void locateDevelopmentCard​(DevelopmentCard toPlace, int position)
      this method is used to locate a card in one of the three position in dashboard.
      Parameters:
      toPlace - contains the developmentCard that the player wants to insert in dashboard
      position - is =1 or =2 or =3; is the position where the card is locate in dashboard

    • buyDevelopmentCard

      public void buyDevelopmentCard​(CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse, CollectionResources toPayFromStrongbox)
      this method buy the a development card removing resources from the dashboard in particular, it removes the resources in the input from the strongbox and from warehouse if the player has a discount of resources, the resources are already discounted by the game
      Parameters:
      toPayFromWarehouse - these are the resources to pay from warehouse
      toPayFromStrongbox - these are the resources to pay from strongbox

    • activateProduction

      public boolean activateProduction​(CollectionResources toPayFromWarehouse, CollectionResources toPayFromStrongbox, CollectionResources toPlaceInBuffer)
      this method activate the production, in particular it removes from warehouse and from strongbox the resources given in input and add to the buffer toPlaceInBuffer
      Parameters:
      toPayFromWarehouse - these are the input resources to remove from warehouse
      toPayFromStrongbox - these are the input resources to remove from strongbox
      toPlaceInBuffer - these are the output resources to add in the buffer
      Returns:
      true if this operation is a success else false

    • fillStrongboxWithBuffer

      public void fillStrongboxWithBuffer()
      this method insert in strongbox all resources contained in buffer

    • activateLeaderCard

      public boolean activateLeaderCard​(int toActivate)
      this method activate the leader card specified by the parameter (it can be the first one or the second one) the method verify if the player have all the requirements to activate the card, and in case activating it, if the card selected is already active does not activate it and return false
      Parameters:
      toActivate - this is the index of the owned leader card to activate
      Returns:
      true if the card got activated correctly, false otherwise

    • discardLeaderCard

      public boolean discardLeaderCard​(int toDiscard)
      this method discard the leader card specified by the parameter (it can be the first one or the second one) if the card has already been activated, it does not discard it if not, the method return true
      Parameters:
      toDiscard - this is the index of the owned leader card to discard it should be from 1 to personalLeaderCards.getSize()
      Returns:
      true if the card got discarded correctly, false otherwise

    • addLeaderWhiteMarble

      public void addLeaderWhiteMarble​(Resource toAdd)
      this method is called when the player activate a new white marble leader card and add a new marble that can be used to substitute a white marble when buying resources from market
      Parameters:
      toAdd - this is the resource to convert in marble to add

    • addDiscount

      public void addDiscount​(Resource toAdd)
      this method is called when the player activate a new discount leader card, if it is the first time, it create a new dashboard adding the resource toAdd if it is the second time, it just add the resource to the discounted ones
      Parameters:
      toAdd - this is the resource discounted associated with the leader card

    • addLeaderShelf

      public void addLeaderShelf​(Resource toAdd)
      this method is called when the player activate a shelf leader card, and it create a new leader shelf
      Parameters:
      toAdd - this is the resource of the leader shelf associated with the leader card

    • addLeaderProduction

      public void addLeaderProduction​(Resource toAdd)
      this method is used to create/activate a leader production. "toAdd" is the resource that a player has to pay to activate the leader Production
      Parameters:
      toAdd - is the resource that the player want to obtain from leaderProduction

    • getVictoryPoints

      public int getVictoryPoints()
      this method get all the victory points of the player in particular, it get the victory points from the dashboard, from the personal track and from the leader cards owned
      Returns:
      the sum of all victory points
